Regulation Name(s): Tubes, Vials, Systems, Serum Separators, Blood Collection
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): VARIANT™ II TURBO Hemoglobin Testing System
VARIANT™ II TURBO Link Hemoglobin Testing System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VARIANT™ II TURBO HbA1c Kit – 2.0 and Hemoglobin Capillary Collection System for quantitative determination of hemoglobin A1c in whole blood using ion-exchange HPLC.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative determination of hemoglobin A1c in human whole blood as an aid in diabetes diagnosis and in identifying patients at risk for developing diabetes; Hemoglobin Capillary Collection System intended for collection of human whole blood for HbA1c testing by Bio-Rad HPLC methods.
